content:

author: JIMMY GOLEN AP Sports Writer
title: Racial injustice themes fill empty NFL stadiums
description: NFL teams opening their seasons in empty stadiums knelt, locked arms or raised fists in protest for pregame ceremonies on the first full Sunday of the football season
content:
Jason Myers kicked off to start the Seahawks' season-opener against the Falcons, and the ball sailed through the end zone for a touchback. No one moved a step.
